description: Galicia reinstates curbs on a coastal area, a day after Catalonia imposed a similar local lockdown.
title: Coronavirus: Spain imposes local lockdown in Galicia
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain imposes local lockdown in Galicia - BBC News
maintext: Sara Canals, a journalist in the region, told the BBC: "Some might consider [this] maybe too drastic, but there's a willingness here to find a right balance between reopening the economy but also to ensure safety."
